channel.title: Write-ups on Xyniath
channel.description: Recent content in Write-ups on Xyniath

item.title: Blunder
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.191 Difficulty: Easy This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Blunder Nmap scan Running nmap -sC -sV -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.191 gave me the following… from here there are only 2 ports that are displayed, ftp is closed and port 80 is open It appears the web server is the only way in! Enumerating Webserver We are greeted with some sort of CMS website. I check the links available to me.

item.title: Cache
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.172 Difficulty: Easy This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Cache. Initial nmap Scan Running the inital nmap scan: nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.188 Yielded the following results: From these results, it shows that there are two ports open Port 80 apache web server Enumerating the Web Server Navigating to the web server, I am presented with this webpage I navigate through the webpage to try find some useful information

item.title: Openadmin
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.171 Difficulty: Easy Initial nmap Scan Running the initial nmap scan: nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap 10.10.10.171 Gave me the following: From the nmap scan, you can see that there isn't too much here. The machine is running Ubuntu Linux Port 22 - The ssh protocol, canâ€™t really access this without credentials Port 80 - HTTP port, usually hosts web pages etc. In this case, it's the Ubuntu Apache web server

item.title: Monteverde
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.172 Difficulty: Easy This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Monteverde. Initial nmap Scan Running the inital nmap scan: nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.172 Yielded the following results: From here, you can see that there are 18 open ports and that the windows is running on windows. Ports That Stand Out Port 389 - shows that there's an Active Directory domain named MEGABANK present on the system which may become useful later.
